The identityType which can be either SystemAssigned or None

argGroup.name: Monitoring Settings Azure Monitor Alert Settings

arg.group: Monitoring Settings Azure Monitor Alert Settings

help.short: Property that specifies whether built-in Azure Monitor alerts should be fired for all failed jobs.

argGroup.name: Parameters
argGroup.arg: <help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>

help.short: Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.

help.lines: Use this parameter to configure immutability settings for the vault. Allowed values are Disabled, Unlocked and Locked. By default, immutability is "Disabled" for the vault. "Unlocked" means that immutability is enabled for the vault and can be reversed. "Locked" means that immutability is enabled for the vault and cannot be reversed.

help.lines: Use this parameter to configure immutability settings for the vault. Allowed values are Disabled, Unlocked and Locked. By default, immutability is "Disabled" for the vault. "Unlocked" means that immutability is enabled for the vault and can be reversed. "Locked" means that immutability is enabled for the vault and cannot be reversed.
